title: Open Information Literacy and Academic Communication Design Experiment

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in utilizing basic academic resources and proficiency in LMS (Learning Management System) usage
context.additional_context: A program for current professionals to strengthen their ability to utilize open resources in mathematical problem-solving processes.

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible information sources related to mathematics education with 90% accuracy using academic databases and open-access materials.
Learners can redesign two types of math problem-solving modules by repurposing openly licensed educational resources.
Learners can improve academic documents to over 80% completion by understanding peer-review procedures and incorporating feedback from fellow learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
